page.title: 18* PUPILS LIKES & DISLIKES *
page.content: {EXPLANATION OF LIST ON PAGE 17 OF {LIKES AND DISLIKES OF A TYPICAL TEN {YEAR OLD ST. KEVINS MIDDLE SCHOOL { PUPIL. {1.}A DIGITAL WATCH IS WHAT YOU TELL THE TIME WITH, DIGITALS TELL THE TIME IN NUMBERS LIKE 7.45 AS IN A 24 HOUR CLOCK THAT TELLS YOU THE DATE AND THE SECONDS. IT WORKS BY ITSELF THEY HAVE TWO BUTTONS ON THE SIDE. {2.}COOKING IS WHEN YOU WANT TO EAT MEAT, YOU CANNOT EAT MEAT RAW BECAUSE YOU WOULD GET FOOD POISONING. SWIMMING IS A SPORT IF YOU GO INTO THE SEA YOU WOULD DROWN. {3.}COFFEE IS A DRINK, IT IS MADE FROM HOT WATER AND COLD MILK AND CRUSHED COFFEE BEANS. SHANDY IS LIKE BEER, IT IS PARTLY BEER AND PARTLY LAGER, IT IS SORT OF BOOZE WHICH IS SHANDY OR LAGER. CHILDREN CAN ONLY DRINK SHANDY. { /continued on page 19......
